text: Britain and Ireland's next Top Model, Cycle 8 is the eighth cycle of Britain & Ireland's Next Top Model. This cycle contains 14 contestants. The host is still Elle MacPherson. The winner was 18-year-old Letitia Herod. ==Prizes== *A modeling contract with Models 1 *A spread in Company magazine *A contract with Revlon cosmetics *A trip to Dubai *An apartment 51 Buckingham Gate *A respected brand as Miss Selfridge ==Contestants== (In alphabetical order) * Kellie Forde * Tasmin "Tas" Golding * Emma Grattidge * Letitia Herod * Jennifer Joint * Anita Kaushik * Lisa Madden * Roxanne "Roxy" O'Connor * Risikat "Pussycat" Oyebade * Amelia Raven * Emma Sharratt * Madeleine "Maddy" Taga * Penelope Williamson * Anne Winterburn ==Episodes== Episode 1 & 2 Casting episodes Episode 3 *Quit: Amelia Raven *Best: Anne Winterburn *Worst: Emma Sharratt & Tasmin Golding *Eliminated: Emma Sharratt Episode 4 *Best: Roxanne O'Connor *Worst: Tasmin Golding & Penelope Williamson *Eliminated: Penelope Williamson Episode 5 *Best: Roxanne O'Connor & Emma Grattidge *Worst: Tasmin Golding & Anne Winterburn *Eliminated: Tasmin Golding Episode 6 *Best: Anita Kaushik *Worst: Emma Grattidge & Anne Winterburn *Eliminated: Anne Winterburn Episode 7 *Best: Lisa Madden *Worst: Madeleine Taga & Kellie Forde *Eliminated: Kellie Forde Episode 8 *Best: Emma Grattidge *Worst: Jennifer Joint & Madeleine Taga *Eliminated: Jennifer Joint Episode 9 *Best: Risikat Oyebade *Worst: Roxanne O'Connor & Madeleine Taga *Eliminated: Madeleine Taga Episode 10 *Best: Lisa Madden *Worst: Letitia Herod & Roxanne O'Connor *Eliminated: Roxanne O'Connor Episode 11 *Best: Anita Kaushik *Worst: Lisa Madden & Risikat Oyebade *Eliminated: Risikat Oyebade Episode 12 *Best: Anita Kaushik *Worst: Letitia Herod & Lisa Madden *Eliminated: Lisa Madden Episode 13 *Best: Emma Grattidge *Worst: Letitia Herod & Anita Kaushik *Eliminated: Anita Kaushik *Final Two: Emma Grattidge & Letitia Herod *Winner: Letitia Herod == References == Category:Top Model television series Category:Britain's Next Top Model
title: Britain & Ireland's Next Top Model (series 8)
